gobblin.data.management.copy

Class PreserveAttributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.copy.PreserveAttributes

  • public class PreserveAttributes
extends Object
    Configuration for preserving attributes in Gobblin distcp jobs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PreserveAttributes.Option
      Attributes that can be preserved.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PreserveAttributes fromMnemonicString(String s)
      Parse PreserveAttributes from a string of the form \[rbugp]*\: * r -> preserve replication * b -> preserve block size * u -> preserve owner * g -> preserve group * p -> preserve permissions Characters not in this character set will be ignored.
      boolean preserve(PreserveAttributes.Option option) 
      String toMnemonicString()
      Converts this instance of PreserveAttributes into a String that can be converted to an equivalent PreserveAttributes using fromMnemonicString(java.lang.String).

      • preserve

        public boolean preserve(PreserveAttributes.Option option)
        Returns:
        true if attribute should be preserved.

      • toMnemonicString

        public String toMnemonicString()
        Converts this instance of PreserveAttributes into a String that can be converted to an equivalent PreserveAttributes using fromMnemonicString(java.lang.String). See the latter for more information.
        Returns:
        a String that can be converted to an equivalent PreserveAttributes using fromMnemonicString(java.lang.String)

      • fromMnemonicString

        public static PreserveAttributes fromMnemonicString(String s)
        Parse PreserveAttributes from a string of the form \[rbugp]*\: * r -> preserve replication * b -> preserve block size * u -> preserve owner * g -> preserve group * p -> preserve permissions Characters not in this character set will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        s - String of the form \[rbugp]*\
        Returns:
        Parsed PreserveAttributes
